1.text: A soft answer will turn away wrath, and a word of pain will bring up anger.

2.text: The tongue of the wise will make knowledge good: and the mouth of the foolish will gush forth folly.

3.text: In every place are the eyes of Jehovah observing closely the evil and the good.

4.text: The healing of the tongue the tree of life: and perverseness in it a breaking in the spirit.

5.text: The foolish will deride his fatherâ€™s instruction: and he watching reproof will be crafty.

6.text: The house of the just much treasure: and in the increase of the unjust the being troubled.

7.text: The lips of the wise will disperse knowledge: and the heart of the foolish not so.

8.text: The sacrifice of the unjust an abomination of Jehovah: and the prayer of the upright his acceptance.

9.text: The way of the unjust an abomination of Jehovah: and he will love him pursuing justice.

10.text: Correction is evil to him forsaking the way: he hating reproof shall die.

11.text: Hades and destruction are before Jehovah: much more the hearts of the sons of man.

12.text: He mocking will not love him reproving him: to the wise he will not go.

13.text: A heart of joy will do the face good: and by pains of heart the spirit was dejected.

14.text: The heart of him understanding will seek knowledge: and the face of the foolish will feed folly.

15.text: All the days of the afflicted are evil: and the good of heart drinking always.

16.text: Good is little with the fear of Jehovah more than much treasure and confusion with it.

17.text: Good a ration of herbs and love there, above an ox of the stall and hatred with it.

18.text: A man of wrath will excite strife: and he slow to anger will appease contention.

19.text: The way of the slothful as the cutting of the thorn: and the path of the upright was raised up.

20.text: A wise son will gladden the father: and the foolish man despised his mother.

21.text: Folly is joy to him wanting heart: and the man of understanding will make straight to go.

22.text: The frustrating purposes with no counsel, but in the multitude of counselors it shall be set up.

23.text: Joy to the man in the answer of his mouth: and a word in its time how good.

24.text: The path of life is above to the understanding one, to depart from hades below.

25.text: The house of the proud will Jehovah sweep away, and he will set up the bound of the widow.

26.text: The purposes of evil an abomination of Jehovah: and the pure speaking of pleasantness.

27.text: He plundering plunder troubled his house; and he hating gifts shall live.

28.text: The heart of the just one shall meditate to answer: and the mouth of the unjust shall gush out evil.

29.text: Jehovah is far off from the unjust: and he will hear the prayer of the just.

30.text: From the light of the eyes the heart will rejoice: and a good report will fatten the bones.

31.text: The ear hearing the reproof of life shall lodge in the midst of the wise.

32.text: He driving away instruction despised his soul: and he hearing reproof obtained a heart.

33.text: The fear of Jehovah the instruction of wisdom; and before honor humility.
